Explore our destinations

With over 150 tours in 34 European countries, we´re certain you´ll find your next adventure.

Top rated tours

Stavanger

On this tour you will start in old town of Stavanger and get to know the city through the eyes of a local.

You will see the Cathedral, learn about the fish history and cycle through colorful streets.

Narrow sweet cobblestone streets and small white wooden houses will give you an idea how life was here earlier.

London

Cycle through central London, covent garden and Cleopatra´s Needle.

Pedal past Trafalgar Square and stop by Buckingham Palace and spot the changing of the guard.

Amsterdam

With the Amsterdam city bike tour, you will experience the highlights of the city

You will learn interesting facts and history and cycle through the old centre of Amsterdam.

Switzerland

On this tour you will cycle around the entire lake Cinstance and get to know three countries and four islands.

You will enjoy the amazing landscape of the lake against the backdrop of the Alps, the romantic villages and sleepy towns around the lake.

Poland

Take time to explore the capital of Poland.

Ride past the former Nazi bunker "Wolfschanze".

Romania

On this tour you will cycle along the Carpathian Mountains with great views.

Experience the lowland valleys with its medievial-looking villages left untouched by time.

Visit some of the German/Saxon church castle along the way.
